SEARCH
Package dev.homework

Class Matrix

java.lang.Object
dev.homework.Matrix
public class Matrix extends Object
Class provides basic operations with matrices, such as addition, multiplication, transposing and finding determinant if exists. This class works only with Complex numbers, which can be built from any primitive types. You can use redefined method toString, which prints matrix in a beautiful way.

      public Matrix add(Matrix another)
      Parameters:

    • multiply

      public Matrix multiply(Matrix another)
      Parameters:
      another - matrix which stick to the rules, otherwise throws IllegalArgumentException
      Returns:
      new matrix with the number of lines equal to first matrix len and the number of columns equal to another matrix wid
      See Also:
      • Matrix multiplication algorithm

    • transpose

      public Matrix transpose()
      Returns:
      new object with inverted matrix

    • getDeterminant

      public Complex getDeterminant()
      Evaluates a determinant by Gaussian elimination
      Returns:
      Complex value of matrix determinant if exists, otherwise throws RuntimeException
      See Also:
      • Gaussian elimination
